com.google.android.exoplayer2.audio

Class Sonic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.audio.Sonic

  • final class Sonic
extends java.lang.Object
    Sonic audio stream processor for time/pitch stretching.

    Based on https://github.com/waywardgeek/sonic.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sonic

        public Sonic(int inputSampleRateHz,
             int numChannels,
             float speed,
             float pitch,
             int outputSampleRateHz)
        Creates a new Sonic audio stream processor.
        Parameters:
        inputSampleRateHz - The sample rate of input audio, in hertz.
        numChannels - The number of channels in the input audio.
        speed - The speedup factor for output audio.
        pitch - The pitch factor for output audio.
        outputSampleRateHz - The sample rate for output audio, in hertz.

    • Method Detail

      • queueInput

        public void queueInput(java.nio.ShortBuffer buffer)
        Queues remaining data from buffer, and advances its position by the number of bytes consumed.
        Parameters:
        buffer - A ShortBuffer containing input data between its position and limit.

      • getOutput

        public void getOutput(java.nio.ShortBuffer buffer)
        Gets available output, outputting to the start of buffer. The buffer's position will be advanced by the number of bytes written.
        Parameters:
        buffer - A ShortBuffer into which output will be written.

      • queueEndOfStream

        public void queueEndOfStream()
        Forces generating output using whatever data has been queued already. No extra delay will be added to the output, but flushing in the middle of words could introduce distortion.

      • getSamplesAvailable

        public int getSamplesAvailable()
        Returns the number of output samples that can be read with getOutput(ShortBuffer).
